name: Soot (IvarForkbeard)
description:
Our second studio release!  In a real departure from our original puzzle game, we present a platformer with a twist - you can't see the platforms until you begin playing!

Help Sooty rescue his girlfriend Molly from the evil vacuum!  50 levels of puzzles and perils.

Once again, all music and artwork come from the mind of our eleven year old partner - as well as a significant chunk of coding this time around!
